modName: CHSBHC Microbikini with breast and butt physics
descriptionHtml:
I have been requesting the microBikini for a long time, since no one made one yet, i decided to convert it myself ~



--- Check out pictures posted by users to see MicroBikini\'s using custom textures from the texture pack! ---



UPDATED 1.2
- Max Weight texture fixed ( for real this time )
- Added Texture pack



This mod allows you to have 3 mikrobikini versions in 1 file. The regular, the topless and the bottomless.

Install the content to your data folder. Open op console \"~\" and type down \"help micro 4\" and you have 3 variants of microbikini\'s to chose from. to get the item id code for the version of the microbikini you want. 
Then type \"Player.additem XXXXXXX 1\" ( In my case, it would be \"player.additem 42001001 1\" for regular MicroBikini )
and then, if you did it right, on the top left of your screen, you\'ll see the \"Microbikini added\" message. 



YOU WILL NEED CHSBHC BODY MOD OR THIS WILL NOT WORK!!!



Big props goes to Aridale in Tesnexus for the original file, and Cherry for CHSBHC. Enjoy
author: DatBoiNC
